name: Mushroom Meaty Sauce
description: Indulge in a healthier twist on classic flavors with our Mushroom Meaty Sauce. Featuring a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar profile, this sauce is perfect for those looking to enjoy hearty meals without sacrificing nutrition. Pair it with your favorite pasta or zoodles for a satisfying, health-conscious meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the vegetables by dicing the red and green capsicum, chopping the white beech mushrooms, and finely chopping the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a frying pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned and no longer pink, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced red and green capsicum, chopped mushrooms, and finely chopped red onion to the pan. Cook for an additional 5 minutes until the vegetables are soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the tomato puree, salt, black pepper, marjoram, tarragon, and minced garlic. Cook for another 7 minutes, allowing the flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve warm over your choice of pasta or zoodles.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
